hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin Al Munkadir:I saw Jabir bin `Abdullah praying in a single garment and he said that he had seen the Prophet (ﷺ) praying in a single garment

chapter.ara-name: باب عَقْدِ الإِزَارِ عَلَى الْقَفَا فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To tie Izar (dress worn below the waist) at one's back while offering Salat (prayers)
